class.name: SkeletonProfile
class.brief_description: Profile of a virtual skeleton used as a target for retargeting.
class.description: This resource is used in [EditorScenePostImport]. Some parameters are referring to bones in [Skeleton3D], [Skin], [Animation], and some other nodes are rewritten based on the parameters of [SkeletonProfile].

method.name: find_bone
method.description: Returns the bone index that matches [code]bone_name[/code] as its name.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Returns the name of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code] that will be the key name in the [BoneMap]. In the retargeting process, the returned bone name is the bone name of the target skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_parent
method.description: Returns the name of the bone which is the parent to the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code]. The result is empty if the bone has no parent.

method.name: get_bone_tail
method.description: Returns the name of the bone which is the tail of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: get_group
method.description: Returns the group of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: get_group_name
method.description: Returns the name of the group at [code]group_idx[/code] that will be the drawing group in the [BoneMap] editor.

method.name: get_handle_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code] that will be the button position in the [BoneMap] editor. This is the offset with origin at the top left corner of the square.

method.name: get_reference_pose
method.description: Returns the reference pose transform for bone [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: get_tail_direction
method.description: Returns the tail direction of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Returns the texture of the group at [code]group_idx[/code] that will be the drawing group background image in the [BoneMap] editor.

method.name: set_bone_name
method.description: Sets the name of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code] that will be the key name in the [BoneMap]. In the retargeting process, the setting bone name is the bone name of the target skeleton.

method.name: set_bone_parent
method.description: Sets the bone with name [code]bone_parent[/code] as the parent of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code]. If an empty string is passed, then the bone has no parent.

method.name: set_bone_tail
method.description: Sets the bone with name [code]bone_tail[/code] as the tail of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: set_group
method.description: Sets the group of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: set_group_name
method.description: Sets the name of the group at [code]group_idx[/code] that will be the drawing group in the [BoneMap] editor.

method.name: set_handle_offset
method.description: Sets the offset of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code] that will be the button position in the [BoneMap] editor. This is the offset with origin at the top left corner of the square.

method.name: set_reference_pose
method.description: Sets the reference pose transform for bone [code]bone_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tail_direction
method.description: Sets the tail direction of the bone at [code]bone_idx[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] This only specifies the method of calculation. The actual coordinates required should be stored in an external skeleton, so the calculation itself needs to be done externally.

method.name: set_texture
method.description: Sets the texture of the group at [code]group_idx[/code] that will be the drawing group background image in the [BoneMap] editor.

signal.name: profile_updated
signal.description: This signal is emitted when change the value in profile. This is used to update key name in the [BoneMap] and to redraw the [BoneMap] editor. [b]Note[/b]: This signal is not connected directly to editor to simplify the reference, instead it is passed on to editor through the [BoneMap].

Direction to the coordinates of specified bone child.
